channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Green light out at pedestrian crossing, 23rd August
item.description:
Green light is not working on left hand side of crossing when travelling downhill from Montpellier towards St Georges Road

item.title: Reserving parking space with bins or cones by residents of 7, Duke Street, 22nd August
item.description:
These people block the space outside their house whenever they drive away. They even do this when away on holiday.

item.title: Large number of potholes all along road, 21st August
item.description:
There are a large number of potholes all along the road. It seems to be mostly where cars pull off their drives. There are also a number that have been filled very poorly and now have the opposite issue of causing a mini speed bump
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Whittington Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Foliage needs cutting back, 21st August
item.description:
The path is getting close to being impassable during to the brambles and nettles encroaching.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 74, Roman Hackle Avenue, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham

item.title: Pothole, 21st August
item.description:
Potholes and road surface cracks/collapse formed on A40 eastbound at egress at Nazareth House adjacent to pedestrian island. Can it be repaired when undertaking repairs already marked out for such, please. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 279, London Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham

item.title: Fly Tip at the Location, 21st August
item.description:
Fly tip of several poly bags containing rubbish at the entrance to the Old Quarry off Cleeve Common Road. Please can it be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Noverton Lane, Southam, Tewkesbury

item.title: Pothole turning into Shelburne Rd, 19th August
item.description:
Pothole at top of the road, as you turn in from Lansdown Rd. exactly lined up with drivers side front wheel, hard to avoid. Deep enough to make a bang and stress the steering rack as you turn.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shelburne Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, damaged road surface., 19th August
item.description:
Potholes, and damaged road surface at the end of Mill Lane as it joins Southam Road. There are a number of them along the road junction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Mill Lane, Southam, Tewkesbury

item.title: Hanging electric cable, 18th August
item.description:
There is a cable being lent on by a branch of a tree pushing this cable down which is now in danger of hitting on coming large vehicles. Branch needs cutting or releasing before a major incident
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass, 17th August
item.description:
